name: Uniroyal Herbals
overview:
Established in the year 2006, we, “Uniroyal Herbals”, are engaged in manufacturing and exporting an array of Herbal Syrups, Juices & Cosmetics.

Products & Services: Herbal Analgesic and Anti Inflammatory Capsules Herbal Liver Care Capsules Herbal Diabetic Capsules Herbal Multivitamin and Multi-mineral Capsules Herbal Urinary Capsules Herbal Iron Calcium Capsules Herbal Uterine Capsules Herbal Menstrual Regulator Capsules Herbal Anti Piles Capsules

Our Vision: To provide world standard pharma products at affordable prices

To develop new formulations as per changing trends

Our Mission: To provide a viable option in terms of high quality products to a vast range of customers

Innovative products & new molecules

A dependable company sticking to ethics in an era where prevails a cut throat competition

Aspirations and Objectives: We are committed to provide new, innovative and competitive drugs to combat diseases. We will actively participate in making medicines available to everyone and anyone. We intend to be globally recognized for having made a positive impact on people’s lives with our products, meeting their needs and even surpassing external expectations.

Our Team: We have very carefully hired a prolific team of professionals via a stringent selection process. Each of our team members works in unity to deliver a defect-free range of Herbal Syrups, Juices & Cosmetics to the customers. We organize various workshops to keep our employees in track of current market trend and industrial innovations. Our team of warehousing professionals store the products with complete care and safety.
